tool_description: This API allows you to add Slide document viewer and editing functions to your web service.
name: Polaris Office Web Slide
title: Polaris Office Web Slide

api_list.name: Generate Document Viewer App
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://polaris-office-web-slide.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/documentApp/generateViwer/slide"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "polaris-office-web-slide.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
